Programs

BountyGraph

Helping make open-source software secure through crowdfunded bug bounties and audits.

Up to $500 per critical bug of $10,000 goal
curl

curl is a command line tool and libcurl is a library - for transferring data with URLs. curl's official web site is https://curl.haxx.se

Up to $33,268 per critical bug of $50,000 goal
GNU Wget

GNU Wget / Wget2 is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP, HTTPS, FTP and FTPS: the most widely-used Internet protocols.

Up to $500 per critical bug of $50,000 goal
Squid

Squid is a popular open source web caching proxy

Up to $33,268 per critical bug of $50,000 goal
